articles.title: Trump’s history-making hush money trial to begin with jury selection
articles.description: This is the first criminal trial of a former American leader.
articles.content:
The hush money trial of former US president Donald Trump is due to begin in New York City with jury selection.
It is the first criminal trial of a former US leader and the first of Trump’s four indictments to go to trial.
